My Recipe Box Entire Site Recipes Products Search Conscious Cooking: Healthy and Fast - Redefine fast food with these quick, good-for-you meal ideas
We're in the kitchen with dietitian Dana Angelo White and favorite Food Network chefs, fixing fast and fresh fare for weekday meals. Try our easy dinner menus, quick breakfasts and lunch and snack options to keep you going all day.
Quick and Easy Dinners
Main-Dish Salad
Smoked turkey and black-eyed peas add heft to this salad
30-Minute Tenderloin
This easy pork main is only 297 calories per serving
Scallops with Quinoa
Perfect with Ellie's Presto Salad and Lemon Icebox Bars
Start Your Day Right
Greek Yogurt
Crustless Spinach Quiche
Vanilla Spice Oatmeal
Apple Muffins
Fruit Salad with Poppy Seed Dressing
Make Your Own Granola
Dana's Standby Recipes
Registered dietitian and athletic trainer Dana Angelo White shares her simplest solutions for weekday meals.
Cook like a dietitian
Easy Good-for-You Soups
Ina's Mexican Chicken Soup Tomato Basil Soup Speedy Soup
Healthy Snacks for Every Day
Skip the vending machine. These healthy and nutritious between-meal munchies will keep you going all day.
Feel good about snacking
Eat Better, Quicker
The convenience of a can Picking the right frozen dinners Simply steamed veggies
